attributes.action: Education at Schools ‘Must’ include Teaching ‘Respect’ to All, NO Respect today.
attributes.additional_details:

Let’s teach RESPECT again and hopefully make the Areas face from young Yobs.
attributes.background:
Many Children today show NO respect to their Seniors which is VERY wrong as they grow Up Abusing Their Elders and even Attack them.

The Police Officers say the same on dealing with them and wasting their time after Advising the Parents with most back at Retail Parks doing the same.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take specific action. 

We understand you are concerned about anti-social behaviour but we aren't sure how you would like the school curriculum to change. 

You could start a new petition setting out the change you would like to see happen.
